rule.assert: An RSS version identifier should be supplied
rule.report: This Schematron validator is for RSS 0.91 only
rule.assert: An RSS element can only contain a single channel element

assert.test: parent::channel or parent::image or parent::item or parent::textinput

rule.assert: A element can only be contained with a channel, image, item or textinput element.
rule.report: A element cannot contain sub-elements, remove any additional markup
